reviewText: its ok  but other dvd's are better.
I regret to pay for it, there is nothing concrete to apply to my puppy...

Enjoyed the video. I haven't got my lab puppy yet but getting ready. I will get my new puppy in a few days. I got this video used and had to laugh when it arrived. the case on one corner was pretty well chewed by probably the puppy someone was trying to train. Hope it was successful. The video itself was not hurt and worked fine.
Very old school but slightly more progressive than strict punishment. Very short, you could learn more specific skills on Youtube.
Kind of slow, but good info.
Not much help. Mainly just two guys talking about what you should teach you pup. Not much showing you how to. They show an older dog "healing" my four month old pup heal's much better.
My puppy ate this DVD before I got to watch it...
Too basic, not enough 'how to' examples. Lacks any  real detail its basically 2 guys talking about training but very little examples.
General discussion of training a hunting pup. Not enough specific examples of technique. Too much talk and not enough pictures. This is a dvd.
Good starter video for a first time trainer. Gets you and your pup ready for a future in hunting and basic obedience.
